opis: Originally created for U.S. pilots in 1937, the Ray-Ban Classic Aviator is one of the world's most recognizable and best-loved styles. The traditional pilot shape gives exceptional lens performance and comfort. These gold frames with green lenses feature wire-thin temples.
A trendsetter in Italian fashion, Giorgio Armani® remains an icon of elegance, refined style, and ageless design.
The Oakley pursuit of performance innovation is unrivaled. Its eyewear pushes the limit to create stylish gear that performs with purpose.

The Oakley pursuit of performance innovation is unrivaled. Its eyewear pushes the limit to create stylish gear that performs with purpose. The Flak 2.0 XL is engineered for sports with a larger, interchangeable lens to protect against wind, sun,and impact. These wrap sunglasses in black, have Prizm™ lenses to reduce glare. Thicker Unobtanium™ temples grip even when wet.

With a history that spans two centuries, Brooks Brothers is one of America's most distinguished menswear brands. These men's designer eyeglasses in matte black bring sleek lines to the rectangular shape. Crafted from metal, these frames are flexible and strong, as well as hypoallergenic. Slim black horn temples feature the Brooks Brothers cursive signature stamp.
